47whsv.t:
What kind of data will we collect?

Information about the content you have viewed or retrieved via Sunrise TV , such as TV broadcasts, movies, and series, including advertisements as well as your ratings and favourites.

We never store adult usage data.

What do we do with this data?

We generate personalised recommendations for you so that you can discover new content.

How long do we keep your data?

We will keep your individual viewing data and data about how you use the service for 90 days.

If you want us to stop collecting this data, you can change your settings at any time in the recommendation menu.

iep0hs.t:
Sunrise TV App is designed to learn your viewing preferences over time and recommend the programs that you will enjoy the most.

Your viewing history will be kept private, adult viewing will never be stored, and we will not sell your personal data to anyone. For more information, please see the FAQs or our Privacy Policy on sunrise.ch

Select 'I give permissions' below to confirm the use of this feature now. You can easily turn this feature OFF or ON at any time via the SETTINGS menu

h4v6kx.t:
Sunrise TV App and your TV box can keep track of which TV programmes you’ve watched or recorded. That’s how TV app can learn your viewing preferences and give you personalised recommendations for top-notch TV shows, films & series.

Your data will not be made public, if you watch an erotic film or series this will not be recorded, and we will never sell your personal information to third parties. For more information on the use of your personal data, please see our privacy statement on sunrise.ch.

The settings for personalised recommendations for TV app and your TV box are linked to each other. If you change the settings here, then the changes will also apply to your TV box.

To start receiving personalised recommendations, select ‘Agree’ below. To continue without enabling this function and only get general recommendations, select ‘Decline’. If you’d like us to stop collecting data at any time, you can change this in Settings on your TV box.

We're constantly working to offer you a better entertainment experience. Here are some of the improvements and changes we've made with this release:

• Profiles – We'll show you which profile is currently active!

• We fixed that annoying bug where you accidentally get thrown out of apps such as Netflix when pressing channel up or down on your remote.

…plus we've added many more bug fixes and performance improvements.

rqsgwn.t:
We're constantly working to offer you a better entertainment experience. Here are the major improvements and changes we've made with this release: 

• Choose a name for your Sunrise TV Box, if you want, by customising it using Sunrise TV on your mobile device. 

• Always wondered on which channel a recording was made? We've added channel logos, so now you'll know. 

• We've introduced a high contrast mode to make screens easier to read. Turn it on in Settings, or just say "Turn on high contrast". 

…plus we've added many more bug fixes and performance improvements!

rgsv7o.t:
We're always working to offer you a better entertainment experience. Based on your feedback we've made the following improvements:

• Binge watching series is now available for Replay TV and Recordings
• On your Favourite channels list, quickly add or remove channels by using the ‘...’ button 
• Audio type is now displayed for additional audio tracks
• Age Rating is now displayed in the PIN pop-up 
• Do you want instant access when renting movies and series, without entering your PIN? You can now change this in settings.

...and many more bug fixes and performance upgrades!

oywfyx.t:

• A new and improved episode selector featuring bigger images of your shows.
• Longer descriptions on the info page to better help you pick your next movie or TV show.

...and many more bug fixes and performance improvements.

Did you know that you can skip through days in the TV Guide with the forward and rewind buttons? Try it out!

pss3jv.t:
We are making your Sunrise TV box better with each release. These are the major improvements:

• Introduced a new setting to highlight the programs with sign language or audio description in the TV Guide.
• No more black thumbnail when scrolling backwards and forwards on the player.

Did you know you can access a variety of shortcuts by pressing the button with the three dots? Try using it in the TV Guide or in the Movie & Series section.

q2rp8u.t:

Did you know that you can zap through a personal channel line-up? Just create a profile and pick your preferred channels.

qcraxt.t:

Did you know that you can add up to 6 personal profiles? Try it out by pressing the button on the side of your remote.

ustbdz.t:
The TV offer from [:value] includes a unique feature which guarantees you a completely customised user experience. By activating the personal recommendations, you consent to your usage data within the [:value] entertainment offer being recorded. A record will be kept of which content you have recorded or watched. Based on this collected data, TV programmes and channels, films and TV series available in OnDemand, as well as apps can be recommended which may interest you. Furthermore, based on this usage history we can present you with personalised advertising or offers based on your customer needs. 

You can switch personal recommendations on and off very easily at any time via the SETTINGS menu. Please note that adult content will not be taken into account or shown in the recommendations. The customer profiles and segments generated on the basis of your usage history will only be shared with third parties in anonymised form and cannot be traced back to you. 

Please note that the activation of personal recommendations applies for all user profiles. As the main user, you are responsible for informing other users about your settings and obtaining their consent. 

Do you want to activate personal recommendations?

ibhohp.t:
Terms of use for the [:value] App Store
These terms of use govern the use of the [:value] App Store and supplement the General Terms and Conditions of [:value] LLC, hereinafter “[:value]”. As the main user, you are responsible for informing other users about these terms of use and obtaining their consent. 
1. Subject matter of these terms of use
Via the [:value] App Store you have access to so-called applications (hereinafter “app” or “apps”) offered by content providers (third parties or in individual cases also by [:value] itself). App is understood to mean every software application or widget via which the relevant content can be provided to the customer via the [:value] App Store. Content is understood to mean any content of an app, including material of an audio-visual or other nature (particularly games, videos and information). 
2. Use and content of the [:value] App Store
The [:value] App Store includes apps from third parties. The sole responsibility for the content of the apps lies with the respective content provider who is listed in the app’s legal notice.
The apps may have their own terms of use and/or general terms and conditions. It may be necessary to conclude a contract to create a user account in order to use the apps. The contract governing the provision and use of the app is entered into solely between you and the respective content provider. 
You are responsible for providing the correct information when concluding the contract. Furthermore, you are responsible for the secrecy of your user name and your passwords as well as for all activities within the app.
3. Privacy and data protection
By using the [:value] App Store, you agree that we may process your personal details in accordance with our General Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy (www.sunrise.ch) 
You are responsible yourself for personal details which you disclose to the content provider. The use of these details by the content provider is governed by its own general terms and conditions and privacy policies. [:value] shall under no circumstances be held responsible for the use of the details you disclose to content providers. 
4. Updates to the service
Updates to the [:value] App Store are intended to improve the service, to extend it, to develop it further, to add new services or to inform you about new services such as new content and functions. You consent to receiving such updates as part of your use of the service and accept that the installation of updates can affect the availability of the service.
I accept the terms of use for the [:value] App Store > Accept.
